tool_description: Access TASI Sectors, Companies, Funds. Sukuk , Bounds in the main and numo market as json
name: TASI To json
title: TASI To json

api_list.name: Get Company Archived
indices ( Archived )
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tasi-to-json1.p.rapidapi.com/indices/archived"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tasi-to-json1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Companies for Sector
api_list.description: This operation will list all companies in single sector for the main market

api_list.name: Get Company Details
api_list.description: The operation will return all latest details for a company by it's ticker

api_list.name: Get Single Sector
api_list.description: This Operation will return a single Sector using it's Id

api_list.name: Get Sector Archived
api_list.description: Get archived details since TASI crawler start working for sector
